testSteps.description: Facility Manager accepts advice #1 - Set Point: Supply Air Temperature, Recommended Value: 23

children.description: Given Felicity has opened their portal
When Felicity accepts the advice about "Supply Air Temperature"
Then Felicity sees that the "Supply Air Temperature" is set to 23

userStory.narrative:
Octaipipe provides advice to Facility Managers to help them with site Management
The advice should read as natural language, summarizing the site evaluation
The advice includes some elements of:
- Site status
- Short term predictions
- Recommended actions
- Incentives
The FM can accept the advice or view more detailed analysis

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
When Felicity accepts the advice about "<Set Point>"
Then Felicity sees that the "<Set Point>" is set to <Recommended Value>

actors.name: Felicity
can: ScheduleWork { scheduler: { clock: { timeAdjustment: { milliseconds: 0 } }, interactionTimeout: { milliseconds: 5000 } } }
CallAnApi { baseURL: "http://127.0.0.1:3000/", headers: { common: { Accept: "application/json, text/plain, */*" } }, timeout: 10000 }
